Labels.Label: PpuControl_2000
Labels.Comment:
7  bit  0
---- ----
VPHB SINN
|||| ||||
|||| ||++- Base nametable address
|||| ||    (0 = $2000; 1 = $2400; 2 = $2800; 3 = $2C00)
|||| |+--- VRAM address increment per CPU read/write of PPUDATA
|||| |     (0: add 1, going across; 1: add 32, going down)
|||| +---- Sprite pattern table address for 8x8 sprites
||||       (0: $0000; 1: $1000; ignored in 8x16 mode)
|||+------ Background pattern table address (0: $0000; 1: $1000)
||+------- Sprite size (0: 8x8; 1: 8x16)
|+-------- PPU master/slave select
|          (0: read backdrop from EXT pins; 1: output color on EXT pins)
+--------- Generate an NMI at the start of the
           vertical blanking interval (0: off; 1: on)

Labels.Label: PpuMask_2001
Labels.Comment:
7  bit  0
---- ----
BGRs bMmG
|||| ||||
|||| |||+- Display type: (0: color, 1: grayscale)
|||| ||+-- 1: Show background in leftmost 8 pixels of screen, 0: Hide
|||| |+--- 1: Show sprites in leftmost 8 pixels of screen, 0: Hide
|||| +---- 1: Show background
|||+------ 1: Show sprites
||+------- Emphasize red
|+-------- Emphasize green
+--------- Emphasize blue

Labels.Label: PpuStatus_2002
Labels.Comment:
7  bit  0
---- ----
VSO. ....
|||| ||||
|||+-++++- Least significant bits previously written into a PPU register
|||        (due to register not being updated for this address)
||+------- Sprite overflow. The intent was for this flag to be set
||         whenever more than eight sprites appear on a scanline, but a
||         hardware bug causes the actual behavior to be more complicated
||         and generate false positives as well as false negatives; see
||         PPU sprite evaluation. This flag is set during sprite
||         evaluation and cleared at dot 1 (the second dot) of the
||         pre-render line.
|+-------- Sprite 0 Hit.  Set when a nonzero pixel of sprite 0 overlaps
|          a nonzero background pixel; cleared at dot 1 of the pre-render
|          line.  Used for raster timing.
+--------- Vertical blank has started (0: not in vblank; 1: in vblank).
           Set at dot 1 of line 241 (the line *after* the post-render
           line); cleared after reading $2002 and at dot 1 of the
           pre-render line.

Labels.Label: OamAddr_2003
Labels.Comment: Set OAM address - Write only

Labels.Label: OamData_2004
Labels.Comment: Read/Write OAM data

Labels.Label: PpuScroll_2005
Labels.Comment: Set PPU scroll, write twice - Write only

Labels.Label: PpuAddr_2006
Labels.Comment: Set PPU address, write twice - Write only

Labels.Label: PpuData_2007
Labels.Comment: Read/Write VRAM

Labels.Label: Sq0Duty_4000
Labels.Comment:
DDLC VVVV
Duty (D), envelope loop / length counter halt (L), constant volume (C), volume/envelope (V)

Labels.Label: Sq0Sweep_4001
Labels.Comment:
EPPP NSSS
Sweep unit: enabled (E), period (P), negate (N), shift (S)

Labels.Label: Sq0Timer_4002
Labels.Comment:
TTTT TTTT
Timer low (T)

Labels.Label: Sq0Length_4003
Labels.Comment:
LLLL LTTT
Length counter load (L), timer high (T)

Labels.Label: Sq1Duty_4004
Labels.Comment:
DDLC VVVV
Duty (D), envelope loop / length counter halt (L), constant volume (C), volume/envelope (V)

Labels.Label: Sq1Sweep_4005
Labels.Comment:
EPPP NSSS
Sweep unit: enabled (E), period (P), negate (N), shift (S)

Labels.Label: Sq1Timer_4006
Labels.Comment:
TTTT TTTT
Timer low (T)

Labels.Label: Sq1Length_4007
Labels.Comment:
LLLL LTTT
Length counter load (L), timer high (T)

Labels.Label: TrgLinear_4008
Labels.Comment:
CRRR RRRR
Length counter halt / linear counter control (C), linear counter load (R)

Labels.Label: TrgTimer_400A
Labels.Comment:
TTTT TTTT
Timer low (T)

Labels.Label: TrgLength_400B
Labels.Comment:
LLLL LTTT
Length counter load (L), timer high (T)

Labels.Label: NoiseVolume_400C
Labels.Comment:
--LC VVVV
Envelope loop / length counter halt (L), constant volume (C), volume/envelope (V)

Labels.Label: NoisePeriod_400E
Labels.Comment:
L--- PPPP
Loop noise (L), noise period (P)

Labels.Label: NoiseLength_400F
Labels.Comment:
LLLL L---
Length counter load (L)

Labels.Label: DmcFreq_4010
Labels.Comment:
IL-- RRRR
IRQ enable (I), loop (L), frequency (R)

Labels.Label: DmcCounter_4011
Labels.Comment:
-DDD DDDD
Load counter (D)

Labels.Label: DmcAddress_4012
Labels.Comment:
AAAA AAAA
Sample address (A)

Labels.Label: DmcLength_4013
Labels.Comment:
LLLL LLLL
Sample length (L)

Labels.Label: SpriteDma_4014
Labels.Comment: Writing $XX will upload 256 bytes of data from CPU page $XX00-$XXFF to the internal PPU OAM.

Labels.Label: ApuStatus_4015
Labels.Comment:
Read:
IF-D NT21
DMC interrupt (I), frame interrupt (F), DMC active (D), length counter > 0 (N/T/2/1)

Write:
---D NT21
Enable DMC (D), noise (N), triangle (T), and pulse channels (2/1)

Labels.Label: Ctrl1_4016
Labels.Comment:
Read (NES - input):
---4 3210
Read data from controller port #1.

Write:
---- ---A
Output data (strobe) to both controllers.

Labels.Label: Ctrl2_FrameCtr_4017
Labels.Comment:
Read (NES - input):
---4 3210
Read data from controller port #2.

Write (Frame counter): MI-- ----
Mode (M, 0 = 4-step, 1 = 5-step), IRQ inhibit flag (I)
